Commands.Jugulating Wasp: 2-hit Melee BRV attack  Extra damage to poisoned enemies  Self: 3 turns ATK Up I  BRV Attack deals extra damage to poisoned enemies for 3 turns
Commands.BRV Attack: Melee BRV attack  Extra damage to poisoned enemies
Commands.Shadow Fang: 4-hit Melee BRV attack + HP attack  Target: Fair chance Poison for 3 turns  Extra damage to poisoned enemies
Commands.Bhavacakra: 4-HIT BRV+HP attack.  BRV stolen from the target can overflow up to 120% of Max BRV.  While Bhavacakra is equipped:  - BRV Attack and HP Attack grant 1 stack of Ninki.  - Jugulating Wasp and Shadow Fang grant 2 stacks of Ninki (max stacks is 5).  When Ninki is greater or equal to 3:  - BRV Attack turns to BRV Attack+ (Ninki).  - Bhavacakra turns to Bhavacakra+ which consumes 3 stacks of Ninki after use.

Artifacts.Debuff Guard Up: Raises Defense Power by 10% while an enemy is debuffed
Artifacts.Break BRV Up: Raises Max BRV by 5% for 1 turn after breaking an enemy
Artifacts.Mighty Jugulating Wasp: Raises BRV Damage dealt by Jugulating Wasp by 10%
Artifacts.Mighty Shadow Fang: Raises BRV Damage dealt by Shadow Fang by 10%

Passives.Jugulating Wasp Charge: Increases the max uses of Jugulating Wasp by 1.
Passives.Bonus Up All: Slightly raises Break Bonus gained by the party after breaking an enemy.
Passives.Jugulating Wasp Power: Slightly raises BRV damage dealt with Jugulating Wasp.
Passives.Shadow Fang Charge: Increases the max uses of Shadow Fang by 1.
Passives.Critical Power: Slightly raises BRV damage dealt with critical hits.
Passives.Shadow Fang Power: Slightly raises BRV damage dealt with Shadow Fang.
Passives.Break Speed Up: Slightly raises Speed for 1 turn after breaking an enemy.
Passives.Trick Attack: Slightly raises BRV damage upon attacking an enemy that is not targeting self.
Passives.The Indiscriminate Rogue: Slightly raises Initial BRV, Max BRV, Attack and Defense when an enemy is poisoned.
Passives.Debuff Initiative: Moderately raises SPD while an enemy is debuffed
Passives.Jugulating Wasp Extension: Jugulating Wasp use +2When using Jugulating Wasp:  Slight damage boost  Moderate damage boost when inflicting Poison  Slight boost to ATK UpSlight boost to damage dealt with BRV Attack to targets inflicted with Poison
Passives.Debuff Boost: Moderately raises MAX BRV while an enemy is debuffed
Passives.Shadow Fang Extension: When using Shadow Fang:  Moderate BRV damage boost  Moderate damage boost when inflicting Poison  Slight boost to Poison hit rate

Weapons.Yoshimitsu CP: 35: Increases Shadow Fang's potency.Raises the success rate of Poison and increases its potency.Grants Small Max BRV Up for 6 turns.
Weapons.Banos Del Sol CP: 15: Increases Jugulating Wasp's potency.Extends the duration of Small Attack Up.Also extends the duration of the damage bonus inflicted to poisoned targets.
